attributes.action: Increase hourly payment of workers who are 'on call' or on 'standby' to the National Minimum Wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Workers who have to be 'on call' or on 'standby' as part of their occupation often have no or very little financial reward for providing this service to their company.  The life of these individuals is disturbed the same as if they were at the workplace.  I would like to petition the PM to recognise this and include it in the National Minimum wage criteria.
